title: Error during sidekiqload on CRuby
body:
Ruby version: `ruby 3.0.2p107 (2021-07-07 revision 0db68f0233) [x86_64-linux]`

I noticed this error first on TruffleRuby but it also happens on CRuby.
It all happens randomly because of `Sidekiq::Scheduled::Poller#random_poll_interval`.

So an easy way to reproduce it reliably is:
* Add `return 1` as the first line of `random_poll_interval`.
* Use `config.logger.level = Logger::WARN` in `bin/sidekiqload` instead of `Logger::ERROR` to get backtraces
* I have `toxiproxy-server` running in a terminal and `redis-server` in another terminal
* Run `bundle exec bin/sidekiqload`

The output:
```
$ bundle exec bin/sidekiqload
2022-01-24T13:01:25.784Z pid=154597 tid=3911 INFO: Booting Sidekiq 6.4.0 with redis options {:db=>13, :port=>6380, :driver=>:hiredis}
2022-01-24T13:01:26.698Z pid=154597 tid=3911 ERROR: Created 100000 jobs
2022-01-24T13:01:26.698Z pid=154597 tid=3911 ERROR: Simulating 1ms of latency between Sidekiq and redis

2022-01-24T13:01:37.382Z pid=154597 tid=3a21 ERROR: requires a block
2022-01-24T13:01:37.383Z pid=154597 tid=3a21 WARN: ArgumentError: requires a block
2022-01-24T13:01:37.383Z pid=154597 tid=3a21 WARN: /home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq.rb:96:in `redis'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/util.rb:74:in `redis'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:51:in `zpopbyscore'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:35:in `block (2 levels) in enqueue_jobs'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:30:in `each'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:30:in `block in enqueue_jobs'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq.rb:100:in `block in redis'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.0.0/gems/connection_pool-2.2.5/lib/connection_pool.rb:63:in `block (2 levels) in with'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.0.0/gems/connection_pool-2.2.5/lib/connection_pool.rb:62:in `handle_interrupt'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.0.0/gems/connection_pool-2.2.5/lib/connection_pool.rb:62:in `block in with'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.0.0/gems/connection_pool-2.2.5/lib/connection_pool.rb:59:in `handle_interrupt'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.0.0/gems/connection_pool-2.2.5/lib/connection_pool.rb:59:in `with'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq.rb:97:in `redis'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:29:in `enqueue_jobs'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:108:in `enqueue'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:100:in `block in start'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/util.rb:56:in `watchdog'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/util.rb:65:in `block in safe_thread'

2022-01-24T13:01:38.384Z pid=154597 tid=3a21 ERROR: requires a block
2022-01-24T13:01:38.384Z pid=154597 tid=3a21 WARN: ArgumentError: requires a block
2022-01-24T13:01:38.384Z pid=154597 tid=3a21 WARN: /home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq.rb:96:in `redis'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/util.rb:74:in `redis'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:51:in `zpopbyscore'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:35:in `block (2 levels) in enqueue_jobs'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:30:in `each'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:30:in `block in enqueue_jobs'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq.rb:100:in `block in redis'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.0.0/gems/connection_pool-2.2.5/lib/connection_pool.rb:63:in `block (2 levels) in with'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.0.0/gems/connection_pool-2.2.5/lib/connection_pool.rb:62:in `handle_interrupt'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.0.0/gems/connection_pool-2.2.5/lib/connection_pool.rb:62:in `block in with'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.0.0/gems/connection_pool-2.2.5/lib/connection_pool.rb:59:in `handle_interrupt'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.0.0/gems/connection_pool-2.2.5/lib/connection_pool.rb:59:in `with'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq.rb:97:in `redis'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:29:in `enqueue_jobs'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:108:in `enqueue'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:100:in `block in start'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/util.rb:56:in `watchdog'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/util.rb:65:in `block in safe_thread'

2022-01-24T13:01:39.385Z pid=154597 tid=3a21 ERROR: requires a block
2022-01-24T13:01:39.385Z pid=154597 tid=3a21 WARN: ArgumentError: requires a block
2022-01-24T13:01:39.385Z pid=154597 tid=3a21 WARN: /home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq.rb:96:in `redis'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/util.rb:74:in `redis'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:51:in `zpopbyscore'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:35:in `block (2 levels) in enqueue_jobs'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:30:in `each'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:30:in `block in enqueue_jobs'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq.rb:100:in `block in redis'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.0.0/gems/connection_pool-2.2.5/lib/connection_pool.rb:63:in `block (2 levels) in with'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.0.0/gems/connection_pool-2.2.5/lib/connection_pool.rb:62:in `handle_interrupt'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.0.0/gems/connection_pool-2.2.5/lib/connection_pool.rb:62:in `block in with'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.0.0/gems/connection_pool-2.2.5/lib/connection_pool.rb:59:in `handle_interrupt'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/vendor/bundle/ruby/3.0.0/gems/connection_pool-2.2.5/lib/connection_pool.rb:59:in `with'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq.rb:97:in `redis'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:29:in `enqueue_jobs'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:108:in `enqueue'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/scheduled.rb:100:in `block in start'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/util.rb:56:in `watchdog'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/util.rb:65:in `block in safe_thread'

2022-01-24T13:01:39.597Z pid=154597 tid=3a11 ERROR: Done, 100000 jobs in 12.899453896 sec
2022-01-24T13:01:39.597Z pid=154597 tid=3a11 ERROR: Now here's the latency for three jobs
0.001720428466796875
0.0015082359313964844
0.0013833045959472656
2022-01-24T13:01:39.802Z pid=154597 tid=3a11 WARN: {"context":"monitor thread"}
2022-01-24T13:01:39.802Z pid=154597 tid=3a11 WARN: SystemExit: exit
2022-01-24T13:01:39.802Z pid=154597 tid=3a11 WARN: bin/sidekiqload:120:in `exit'
bin/sidekiqload:120:in `block (2 levels) in <top (required)>'
/home/eregon/code/sidekiq/lib/sidekiq/util.rb:56:in `watchdog'
bin/sidekiqload:103:in `block in <top (required)>'
```

The value of `conn` in `zpopbyscore` is `#<Redis client v4.2.5 for redis://127.0.0.1:6380/13>`.
